name: BAD GOBLET
description:
who dares search for it in the terrible basement

There is a dark tower with a deep basement that holds the BAD GOBLET, an evil artifact that many have attempted to retrieve for research... or to make use of its strange powers...

You're desperate enough to try and find it. You will face evil monsters and the limits of your own strength and wit. Also the tower is really really scary.

A tiny permadeath dungeon game

Design, code and art by dominik johann
Music by 0999
m5x7 font by Daniel Linssen

Press F to change window size
Press Alt + Enter to toggle full screen
